items.title: Business in the Week Ahead: May 26-30, 2025
items.description: India and US GDP, US Fed meeting minutes, US inflation are key data points to track. Four new IPOs will open for subscription

items.title: Wall Street futures flat as rising yields keep investors cautious
items.description: As things stand, the major stock indices are headed for a losing week. Through Thursday’s close, the S&P 500 is down nearly 2 percent, while the Dow has slipped 1.9 percent.

items.title: Paras Defence shares rise 1% after firm forms JV with Israel's Heven Drones to make cargo drones in India
items.description: Paras Defence will hold a majority stake of 51 percent in the joint venture company, while Heven Drones will hold the rest of the stake.

items.title: Nifty, Sensex edge up today but register 0.5% weekly declines | Closing Bell
items.description:
Markets rebound! Sensex jumps 700+ pts, Nifty crosses 24,850 led by IT & FMCG. Pharma lags, smallcaps shine. Catch Lovisha Darad and 
 Yatin Mota as they discuss key movers, sector trends, and what's driving Dalal Street's mood swing. Don’t miss it!

items.title: FMCG shares rebound after strong ITC Q4 results; index top sectoral gainer
items.description: Nifty FMCG index rose nearly 2 percent in intra-day trade, driven by gains in ITC, Varun Beverages and Nestle India.

items.title: Accumulate PI Industries; target of Rs 4065: Devan Choksey
items.description: Devan Choksey recommended accumulate rating on PI Industries with a target price of Rs 4065 in its research report dated May 23, 2025.

items.title: Bondada Engineering shares hit 10% upper circuit after firm wins Rs 9,000-crore order from Andhra government
items.description: Bondada said this Rs 9,000 crore order will increase its order book to over Rs 14,000 crore. The project is expected to generate 3,900 jobs in Andhra Pradesh.

items.title: Emcure Pharma shares hit upper circuit as net profit zooms 63% to Rs 197 crore
items.description: The company's profit growth was propelled by a 19% YoY rise in revenue from operations, which stood at Rs 2,116 crore.

items.title: Accumulate Divis Laboratories; target of Rs 7518: Devan Choksey
items.description: Devan Choksey recommended accumulate rating on Divis Laboratories with a target price of Rs 7518 in its research report dated May 23, 2025.

items.title: Max Estates shares soar 7% on targetting up to 20 percent higher pre-sales for FY26
items.description: Max Estates held an optimistic outlook for the ongoing FY26, planning to deliver pre-sales in the range of Rs 6,000-6,500 crore.

items.title: BSE shares gain 5% as it adjusts for 2:1 bonus issue, stock trades ex-date
items.description: BSE shareholders will receive two bonus shares for every one share held, effectively tripling the number of shares in circulation

items.title: Honasa Consumer shares jump 12% after Q4 revenue rises 13% to over Rs 533 crore
items.description: Honasa Consumer posted a 13 percent year-on-year (YoY) increase in revenue from operations in the March quarter.

items.title: FIIs net buy shares worth Rs 1,796 crore; DIIs pump Rs 300 crore on May 23
items.description: For the year so far, FIIs have been net sellers of shares worth Rs 1.20 lakh crore, while DIIs have net bought Rs 2.42 lakh crore worth of shares.

items.title: Bulk and Block Deals: Bandhan Mutual Fund buys 0.91% stake in Pondy Oxides on May 23
items.description: Nippon India Mutual Fund made a purchase of 19,50,000 shares or 0.83 percent stake in Ramco Cements at an average price of Rs 1,005.03.

items.title: US markets sink as Donald Trump rekindles trade tensions; Apple drops over 3%
items.description: Trump also escalated tensions with the European Union, calling trade negotiations “dead” and recommending a blanket 50 percent tariff on EU imports starting June 1, 2025.
